item.title: Second largest gem quality diamond ever found recovered in Botswana
item.description:
Second largest gem quality diamond ever found recovered in Botswana

"I am truly at a loss for words," said William Lamb, CEO of the small Canadian mining firm, Lucara, that found the stone. "We are truly blessed by this amazing asset." Shares in Lucara shot up as much as 37 per cent yesterday, despite the fact that a valuation is currently impossible.

item.title: It's finally live. Raymond Lees Jewellery is on the web. From here on we'll be uploading Gallery images regularly, setting up our online store and keeping you informed of all hat goes on to make those personal handmade pieces that you cherish
